meanings.definition: To exceed in fawning over someone or something.
meanings.sent1: She was outfawning her favorite celebrity by showering them with compliments.
meanings.sent2: The politician was caught outfawning the wealthy donors at the fundraiser.
meanings.sent3: The cat was outfawning the new toy mouse, pretending to be its best friend.
meanings.sent4: The student was outfawning the teacher, hoping for a better grade on the test.
meanings.sent5: The puppy was outfawning its owner, wagging its tail and licking their hand.

meanings.definition: To surpass in insincerely flattering or praising someone or something.
meanings.sent1: He was outfawning his boss in hopes of getting a promotion.
meanings.sent2: The salesperson was outfawning the customer to make a sale.
meanings.sent3: The comedian was outfawning the audience, pretending to be their best friend for laughs.
meanings.sent4: The influencer was outfawning their followers, showering them with insincere compliments.
meanings.sent5: The student was outfawning the teacher, hoping for a better grade on the test.
